p: The World Health Organization (WHO) published a list of diseases that pose a population health risk. Viruses such as COVID-19, Crimean-Congo hemorrhagic fever, Ebola virus disease, Rift Valley fever, Zika, Middle East respiratory syndrome coronavirus (MERS-CoV), and Severe Acute Respiratory Syndrome (SARS) were listed as the one with the urgent need for more effective countermeasures ( Who, 2020).
